message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be around $1200000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1150000. This offer includes comprehensive support and customization options tailored to your specific needs. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision.
